name: Ghoul Gourmet
description:
Ghould Gurmet is a simple arcade-action game for the Android platform in which Zombies will try to reach the beef steak in the center of the screen. Your task is to zap them by touching them as you avoid the depletion of the life bar and aim for a high score.

Inspired in Game and Watch games, Witch and Hero and some Ideas from my niece, this was the first game I ever finished.
